snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby skated before the team’s practice but remains sidelined indefinitely with a broken jaw.
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby skated before the team’s practice but remains sidelined indefinitely with a broken jaw.

headline.seo: Injured Sidney Crosby Is Back on Skates
headline.main: Injured Crosby Is Back on Skates
headline.print_headline: Injured Crosby Is Back on Skates
